name: recreio-js
description: Javascript package for the API provided by recre.io

scripts.build: tsc --out dist/main.js src/main.ts && browserify dist/main.js -o dist/recreio.js && browserify dist/main.js -d --plugin [minifyify --map dist/recreio.min.map.json --output dist/recreio.min.map.json] > dist/recreio.min.js

author: recre.io
